title: (x) gymclassmagazine masthead / bold condensed grotesque - Helvetica Neue 77 {Rob Mientjes}
content:
can you please tell me what font the masthead for gymclassmagazine is?

Thought it was Franklin Gothic Demi Condensed, but the spur of the G is different

Much appreciated

[http://www.gymclassmagazine.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015003155/http:/www.gymclassmagazine.com/ "http://www.gymclassmagazine.com/")
author: Tops

comments.content: It's a Condensed flavour of Helvetica Neue. 77 Bold Condensed should do the trick.
